amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Reorganization; transfer of property; how effected.
amendatorysection.para: If village government shall have been adopted as aforesaid, the board of trustees shall, at the expiration of sixty days from said election, enter upon the duties of their offices; and all books, papers, records, money and property of such city shall be delivered over to the board of trustees; and the authority of the city council and all city officers shall cease from and after the taking effect of village government in such city.
